title: Between the Scenes - A Lack of Leadership During the Coronavirus Crisis
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - A Lack of Leadership During the Coronavirus Crisis
description:
Trevor puts the coronavirus statistics into perspective and stresses the importance of strong leadership during the outbreak. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
